name: Cendol
description: A refreshing dessert made with shaved ice, green jelly noodles, and coconut milk.

name: Char Kway Teow
description: Stir-fried flat rice noodles with egg, prawns, bean sprouts, and chives, served with a rich soy sauce.

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
description: Tender chicken served with fragrant rice cooked in chicken fat, accompanied by chili sauce and ginger paste.

name: Laksa
description: A spicy noodle soup with a coconut-based broth, topped with shrimp, tofu, and bean sprouts.

name: Curry Mee
description: A rich and flavorful curry noodle soup with chicken, tofu, and vegetables, served with noodles.

name: Nasi Lemak
description: A traditional dish featuring coconut rice, fried anchovies, boiled egg, cucumber, and sambal.

name: Roti Canai
description: A crispy and flaky flatbread served with dhal curry or sugar for dipping.

name: Satay
description: Grilled skewers of marinated meat, typically served with peanut sauce.

name: Ais Tingkap
description: Ais Tingkap, or 'Window Sherbet,' is a refreshing Penang drink made with rose syrup, coconut water, coconut flesh, basil seeds, and shaved ice. Its vibrant pink color and sweet, floral flavor make it a unique and hydrating treat, perfect for cooling off in the tropical heat.

name: Ice Kacang (ABC)
description: Shaved ice topped with red beans, sweet syrup, and condensed milk.

name: Bubur Cha Cha
description: A sweet dessert made with coconut milk, yam, and sweet potatoes.
